summary: REQ-10 and REQ-11 appear implemented: the HTML document title in frontend/index.html was updated, and new developer documentation (frontend/README.md) explains exactly where to change it and notes that no runtime document.title setting exists.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated internal repository summary/metadata files not requested by the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to change the HTML title and add developer-facing documentation about where to update it; modifying these tracking/summary files is extra scope.
